transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji, namaste. Namaste sir, kaise ho?
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan main bhi badhiya sir main. Haan main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun sir. Aap feedback team se. Actually aapne 9696 wale pe call kiya tha. Hello.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan, to kya concern the sir? Bataye. Haan sir, to kya concern hai bataye ki sir kuch?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi sir kuch nahi. Lag gaya tha call aapko.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. To ye aap koi aur concern nahi hai buylead wagera achchi khasi aa rahi hai sir ya nahi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi yaar buylead to buylead jo aana hai sir to kya grahak set hi nahi ho raha samajh mein nahi aa raha kya hai.
Executive: Sir aapki jo Kajal mam hai Kajal jo accountant hai aapke accounts manage karti hai wo aapko proper guide karti hai ya nahi karti hai sir? Guide karti hai?
Customer: Haan call call aata hai.
Executive: Achcha wo aapko call karti hai hai na? To iske liye hai sir aapko service mein jo bhi issues ho aap wo discuss karoge sari cheeze karoge. Theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Tab wo aapko batayengi kaise service use karna hai kya cheeze karna hai wo aapko sari cheeze bata dengi. Theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Okay ji okay. To ye cheeze hai sir aur abhi tak kaisa response raha overall sir?
Customer: Response kaise aaya hai ye grahak nahi lagta hai to phir kya matlab?
Executive: Achcha achcha. Nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Ab kya kis product se related aapko sabse jyada buylead chahiye bataye sir. Ye LED batana.
Customer: Hame to actually mein sir hamara ye garden ka hai.
Executive: Kiska hai sir? Furniture wagera garden furniture restaurant furniture.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: In cheezon mein. Ek second main dikhata hun sir aapko buylead aapke product se related hi buylead dikhata hun. Bahut sari buylead aap dekh rahe hain sir aap use nahi kar rahe ho na? Ek minute ek minute. Haan.
Customer: In ladke se baat karo inko batao.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir namaste kaise ho aap?
Customer: Namaste badhiya sir.
Executive: Haan Komal Prasad Pandey baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Haan ek kaun se product ki aapko buylead sabse jyada chahiye bataye sir?
Customer: Sir ye restaurant table and chair ki.
Executive: Achcha achcha restaurant table. Abhi dekhiye sir jaise haan jaise hame samajh gaya jaise aap pehli hi buylead dekhoge restaurant and cafe furniture set. Turant pehli hi buylead dikh rahi hai sir. Web restaurant web restaurant cafe chair char piece ke liye. Itni achchi achchi order value dikh rahi hai na sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ye aap consume kijiye buylead ko sir.
Customer: Haan sahi hai.
Executive: Haan sahi hai. Ye plastic ki inki jyada aati hai sir. Plastic ki ek clock ho gayi. Hmm. Wall clock ho gayi. Aap unki jyada aati hai.
Customer: Plastic ki aati hai usko not relevant mark kar dijiye. Wahan pe feedback ka bhi aata hai wahan feedback kis wajah se aap mark kar rahe hain wo dal dijiyega. Theek hai? Not relevant isliye aapko plastic ki hame nahi dikhai de rahi hai. Theek hai sir? Ab main dekh leta hun aapke product wagera mein kai wo to plastic ki to nahi hai sir hai na?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Haan. Aapki plastic ki nahi dikhi isme add nahi hai. Theek hai? To koi dikkat nahi hai sir. Theek hai? Jo bhi cheeze hoga main aur discuss kar lunga apne according. Theek hai? To service mein is aapko aur need hogi aap mujhe call karna aur kya kar lenge isme improvement kar sakte hain sir aap batayenge?
Executive: Aur fir main batata hun sir baad mein aapko main abhi thoda kaam aaya hun.
Executive: Achcha achcha. Theek hai sir koi dikkat nahi hai main ek kaam karta hun.
Customer: Haan haan kal connect kar lena. Main ek kaam karta hun jo aapne customer care ko call kiya tha wo ticket raise ho jati hai main usko close kar raha hun wo feedback ke liye jayega. Theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To theek hai sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Usko hello feedback ke liye jata hai. Haan?
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Haan hello to wo us pe jayega. Theek hai sir? To wahan pe aap resolve resolve kar lenge hum log haan. To jisse aapka better rahega haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Haan. Kya sir?
Executive: Kal connect karta hun main abhi thoda sa kaam aaya hun. Awaaz kat rahi hai thoda bahar hun main.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan haan boliye sir. Hello.
Customer: Haan sir boliye boliye main sun raha hun. Haan main keh raha hun haan aise bol raha hun main kal connect karta hun aaram se abhi thoda bahar aaya hun.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Kal connect karta hun sir. Theek hai sir?
Executive: Theek hai sir koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Okay. To aap baat kar lena usse. Theek hai? Aur wo feedback ke liye jayega to wo de dena hame theek hai. Thank you.
Executive: Thank you sir. Okay bye.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Wants buyleads related to restaurant furniture.

- Receiving buyleads for plastic products.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to mark irrelevant buyleads.

- Executive assured to discuss the issue internally.

- Executive offered assistance for further service needs.

- Executive will close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect later due to work.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, restaurant furniture, plastic products, feedback
